page.title: 17THE VILLAGE SHOP,BRADWELL
page.content: {*}The village shop is owned privately; it does not supply all the income the owner needs,so he also runs a car repair business. {*}The shop is open from 8a.m.to 6p.m. weekdays(except for Wednesday which is half-day closing),Saturday morning and Sunday from 10 a.m. to 1 p.m..The shop is open on most bank holidays. {*}Over the past four years there has been a slight increase in income.There are about 150 customers each week.This may decrease in the future as more young people,with their own cars, come to live here.The supermarkets in Braintree take most of the trade. {*}A girl is employed on Saturday mornings.There is no regular delivery of goods,but the owner will deliver,if asked.The shop is also a Post Office, and sells general groceries,drinks and confectionery,but no local produce.
